Today, Tony the Cat decides to take a stroll in the park.
There are many sights to see: green trees, pretty flowers, and
birds all over the place. There is also a cart selling delicious
New York hot dogs. Tony walks up to the hot
to the hot dog cart
and orders two delicious and juicy hot dogs. They are steamy and
covered in Ketchup and mustard. Tony opens his mouth, but
right then, a bird swoops in and steals the hot dog! Tony is
devastated as he watches the bird and his hot dog fly.
into the setting sun.
off
